properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 7:50PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warnings continue for the Cahaba River Near Cahaba
Heights...Centreville...Suttle...and Marion Junction...

.Heavy rainfall from today is causing continued rises along the
Cahaba River, and additonal rainfall of 1 to 3 inches of rainfall
is expected over the next 24 hours. Therefore, flood warnings
remain in effect along the Cahaba River.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Cahaba River At Marion Junction.
* from Thursday afternoon until further notice...or until the Warning
is cancelled.
* AT 7 PM Monday the stage was 30.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 36 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Thursday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 38.1 feet by Friday evening.
* Impact...At 36 feet...Flooding is confined mainly to farm and
pasture lands in the area.
* Impact...At 40 feet...Extensive overflow of farm lands around
Marion Junction occurs. Some homes and farms begin to be affected.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
